protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: This protein binds the cAMP response element (CRE), a sequence present in many viral and cellular promoters. CREB stimulates transcription on binding to the CRE. Transcription activation is enhanced by the TORC coactivators which act independently of Ser-133 phosphorylation. Implicated in synchronization of circadian rhythmicity

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
